item.title: Linux System Administrator from scratch
item.description: The Selectel System Administration course is an educational program provided by experts from Selectel. It breaks down what a system administrator does, what tasks they perform, and why their role is so critical.

item.title: Github Lab
item.description: Laboratory work project. Architecture of computers and operating systems. Section “Operating Systems”

item.title: Introduction to Linux
item.description: Introduction to Linux is a course provided by teachers from Bioinformatics Institute. It includes basic information about how to execute and install files, work with servers and programm on Bash using vim or other editors.
